document.full_text: the united states accused libyan leader muammar gaddafi on friday of defying international demands for an immediate ceasefire, hours after president barack obama said he faced military action if he did not comply.
document.title: u.s. accuses gaddafi of violating u.n. resolution
lines_and_colors: the united states accused libyan leader muammar gaddafi on friday of defying international demands for an immediate ceasefire, hours after president barack obama said he faced military action if he did not comply.
